body:
Create Procedure dbo.Sp_Rn_$CURSOR$
As
Set NoCount On

Begin
    /*
        Yazan	: renium
        Tarih	: 12.10.2024
        Açıklama:
    */
    Begin Try
        Declare @p Int

        Declare cName Cursor Local For
        Select  * From  dbo.Tb_Rn_Inventory_Items II

        Open cName

        Fetch Next From cName
        Into @p

        While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 Begin

            --yapılacak işlem yazılır
            Exec sp @p = @p

            Fetch Next From cName
            Into @p
        End

        Close cName
        Deallocate cName
    End Try
    Begin Catch
        Declare @ObjectName NVarchar(126);

        Set @ObjectName = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID);

        Exec dbo.SP100_GenerateError @ObjectName;
    End Catch
End
Go
